item.title: Ciphertext Challenge II
item.description: Your mission this time: to correctly match each piece of ciphertext with its corresponding piece of plaintext. Daunting! Also, there are some new ciphers in play this time, which will involve some meta-puzzling. Enjoy!

item.title: 2019 Thales AIChallenge4Health
item.description: The purpose of this challenge is to carry out spot detection in X-ray medical images in the surgical field.

item.title: iMet Collection 2019 - FGVC6
item.description: This is a Kernels-only competition. Recognize artwork attributes from The Metropolitan Museum of Art

item.title: Workshop on Autonomous Driving 2019 | Challenge
item.description: We host a challenge to understand the current status of computer vision algorithms in solving the environmental perception problems for autonomous driving. We have prepared a number of large scale datasets with fine annotation, collected and annotated by Berkeley Deep Driving Consortium, nuTonomy and DiDi. Based on the datasets, we have define a set of four realistic problems and encourage new algorithms and pipelines to be invented for autonomous driving. More specifically, they are nuScenes challenge Challenge 1: nuScenes 3D Detection Challenge 2: BDD100K and D²-City Detection Domain Adaptation Challenge 3: D²-City and BDD100K Tracking Domain Adaptation

item.title: iNaturalist 2019 at FGVC6
item.description: Fine-grained classification spanning a thousand species

item.title: Jigsaw Unintended Bias in Toxicity Classification
item.description: This is a Kernels-only competition. Detect toxicity across a diverse range of conversations

item.title: 腾讯广告算法大赛 2019
item.description: 本次竞赛将提供历史n天的曝光广告的数据（特定流量上采样），包括对应每次曝光的流量特征（用户属性和广告位等时空信息）以及曝光广告的设置和竞争力分数；测试集是新的一批广告设置（有完全新的广告id，也有老的广告id修改了设置），要求预估这批广告的日曝光 。（出于业务数据安全保证的考虑，所有数据均为脱敏处理后的数据。）
